description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Phuket, Thailand. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Phuket Beachfront Luxury with All-Inclusive Dining, Daily Free-Flow Drinks & Massages
hotels.description: Indulge in beachfront luxury at the award-winning Aleenta Phuket Beach Resort & Spa, an exquisite all-inclusive sanctuary set on the untouched shores of Natai Beach. A proud member of the prestigious Leading Hotels of the World, this retreat offers the ultimate escape, where every detail is thoughtfully curated for absolute indulgence. Rejuvenate body and mind with bespoke treatments at the acclaimed Ayurah Spa, and savour nourishing, artfully plated cuisine at The EDGE - a fine-dining destination that celebrates Thailand’s vibrant culinary heritage. As twilight descends, toast to another perfect day with front-row views of Phuket’s breathtaking sunsets. Framed by the raw beauty of Phang Nga’s dramatic limestone karsts and stretching across 10 kilometres of secluded golden sands, this tranquil haven feels worlds away. When adventure calls, explore nearby national parks, jungle-draped islands or the iconic Samet Nangshe Viewpoint, just 45 minutes from the resort - where panoramic vistas await.

hotels.title: Phuket All-Inclusive Oceanfront Oasis near Patong Beach with Massages & Free-Flow Cocktails
hotels.description: Discover a dreamy Thai escape at this five-star retreat, a picturesque cliffside hideaway in Phuket. Boasting spectacular views of the Andaman Sea and the rolling hills of North Patong, this idyllic resort is ideally placed for soaking up the sun or the local culture, sitting moments from the buzzing downtown area and Patong Beach. Spend balmy days swimming in one of the resort’s stunning ocean-view pools, indulge in a day of tranquillity at Diamond Spa, or take your tastebuds on a culinary journey with four exquisite restaurants and four ultra-cool bars to choose from. Diamond Cliff Resort & Spa is surrounded by lush vegetation, yet is just steps from the waves of the pristine Sea Salt Beach and the cool, calm waters of JB Sunset Beach. When you’re ready to tear yourself away from the hotel's glorious amenities, Patong’s exciting city centre is a short five-minute shuttle ride away - shop at Jungceylon Shopping Mall and Bangla Road Walking Street, hit up the city’s thrilling nightlife and explore endless dining venues.

hotels.title: Phuket Bestseller: Beachfront Indulgence with All-Inclusive Dining, Free-Flow Cocktail Hour & Kids Stay Free
hotels.description: Situated on the golden sands of Kata Noi Beach with unrivalled views of the sparkling Andaman Sea, this is undoubtedly one of Phuket's finest resorts. This beachfront retreat is all about luxury, with multiple restaurants and bars, nine incredible swimming pools and an indulgent haven of relaxation in Tew Son Spa. With a free-flow drinks upgrade available, this is your ultimate all-inclusive Phuket escape. Delight in Thai or Western flavours at Chom Talay, savour fresh seafood on the beachfront at Fisherman's Wharf, or sip on a cocktail at one of the multiple pool or beach bars. With all-inclusive dining, plus a daily free-flow cocktail hour, you know that indulgence is guaranteed. There's a daily shuttle to Patong and Phuket, as well as a tour desk to arrange a variety of exciting excursions. Spend your day exploring gilded temples, astonishing cultural attractions, heritage natural landmarks and Phuket's best beach clubs before enjoying a relaxing evening at this incredible resort.

hotels.title: Thailand Iconic Glamour: Phuket Beachfront Suites & Villas with Nightly Dinner & Free-Flow Cocktail Hour
hotels.description: This is your exclusive invitation to experience Phuket's glamour at its absolute finest. Escape to golden shores of Surin Beach - considered one of Phuket's best beaches - and discover new levels of luxury at this iconic oceanfront sanctuary, perched magnificently atop the island's western hilltops. Framed by one of Asia's most spectacular backdrops, this secluded haven - a longstanding member of the prestigious Design Hotels collection - offers a breathtakingly romantic escape, with uninterrupted views over the Andaman Sea from almost every angle. Home to just 109 timeless suites, cottages and villas - each featuring tailor-made furnishings and framed by swaying coconut palms, hidden paths and rolling hillsides - The Surin Phuket also offers easy access to one of the island's best beaches. Return for cocktails by the resort's incredible hexagonal pool, exquisitely tiled in black anthracite, or explore authentic Thai flavours at the alfresco Beach Restaurant. The Surin Spa offers an award-winning wellness program that's unrivalled across the program, utilising a combination of warm stones and frangipani, tangerine and lotus essential oils; with one 60-minute massage per adult included, it's an experience you're guaranteed never to forget.

hotels.title: Phuket Beachfront Bliss with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Free-Flow Rooftop Cocktail Hour
hotels.description: Sun-drenched days begin on powder-white sand and end with rooftop cocktails as the sun sinks into the Andaman Sea at this beachfront oasis. Just 15 minutes from the buzz of Patong Beach, this hidden haven offers the best of both worlds for couples and families. Start each morning with a generous buffet breakfast at Soul Kitchen Restaurant, where alfresco dining comes with sweeping sea views. Between dips in the ocean and poolside lounging, crack open a fresh coconut at the swim-up bar. Come sunset, head to On The Roof for daily free-flow cocktail hour and front-row views of the Andaman Sea. Wellness takes centre stage, with tailored treatments at In Balance Spa and daily fitness activities at In Balance Gym. There’s also kayaking and a range of watersports to keep the pace as relaxed or adventurous as you like. After days spent by the sea, retreat to your private oasis, each with its own balcony.

hotels.title: Grand Opening: Modern Phuket Stay near Patong Beach with Daily Breakfast & Free-Flow Drinks Hour
hotels.description: In the heart of Patong and mere moments from the beach, this design-forward hotel brings a new kind of energy to one of Phuket's most iconic beaches. Only recently opened, this hotel is colourful, connected and right at the centre of it all. Step outside to find Patong's electric nightlife, markets, beach clubs and shopping, or start the day with buffet breakfast at Warehouse before heading to the sand. Dining is flexible, with a curated selection of eateries from big flavour plates at Warehouse to handcrafted pizzas and the iconic Hard Rock Cafe Phuket all housed within the same building. When it’s time to recharge, head to the breezy pool courtyard for a relaxed change of pace, while the 24-hour fitness centre is equipped with the latest cardio and strength machines. With sleek rooms and a mix of venues right at your doorstep, it's the perfect home base that lets you experience Patong at full tilt whether you're here to explore or unwind.

hotels.title: Tranquil Novotel Phuket Beachfront Escape on Kamala Bay with Outdoor Pool & Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Endless sea views, lush tropical foliage, powder-white sands and trademark Novotel luxury converge at this sprawling beachfront oasis on Thailand's largest island, Phuket. Tucked away on the quiet cerulean shores of Kamala Bay, the resort boasts exquisitely designed rooms, suites and villas and offers the perfect slice of tropical paradise. Spend your days soaking up the sun, swimming laps in the sparkling outdoor pool and sipping on refreshing tiki cocktails from the swim-up pool bar, Lilo. When hunger strikes, savour authentic Thai dishes at Soul Kitchen, catch live sporting action from The Living Room sports bar and enjoy epic sunsets from On the Roof rooftop bar. If you wish to explore, the vibrant nightlife of Patong and Old Phuket Town is only a short drive away.

hotels.title: Idyllic Phuket Escape near Old Town with Spa & Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Nestled in the heart of Phuket, this modern retreat places you just moments from the city's Sino-Portuguese quarter and local markets. Complete with a stylish sky lounge, pool and bar, the hotel's rooftop hangout is the perfect spot to enjoy tropical cocktails, delicious bites and relaxing swims paired with panoramic city vistas. For a taste of local culture, visit the revered Wat Chalong, the largest Buddhist temple in Phuket, or explore the Phuket Elephant Sanctuary for special encounters with these gentle giants. Back at the hotel, unwind with a traditional Thai massage at the spa and indulge in all-day dining at the onsite Amor restaurant.

hotels.title: Five-Star Phuket Oceanfront Retreat with Michelin-Star Restaurant & World-Class Spa
hotels.description: Discover heaven on Earth at Trisara, a world-class haven of opulent private villas graced with unparalleled views of the Andaman Sea and gleaming swimming pools. For pure tranquillity and bliss, the exclusive Jara Spa is a pampering oasis framed by a century-old ficus tree, and every massage, Himalayan salt compress or foot reflexology treatment is crafted to help achieve balance and restoration. Experience culinary innovation and excellence, and dine onsite at PRU, a Michelin-starred restaurant. Fresh vegetables, fruits and herbs are sourced from the onsite farm, while seafood is line-caught in an active pursuit of sustainability while supporting local suppliers. Allow Head Chef Jimmy Ophorst to take you on a sumptuous gastronomic journey when you indulge in an unforgettable seven-course degustation or wine pairing experience.

hotels.title: Elegant Five-Star Phuket Beachfront Hideaway with Seven Restaurants & Five Swimming Pools
hotels.description: Experience the epitome of beachfront luxury at the InterContinental Phuket Resort, an IHG Hotel, nestled amidst the verdant hills of Phuket's central coast. This tropical paradise offers direct beach access for sun-soaked days, while five shimmering swimming pools provide a refreshing escape. Indulge in the resort's serene Sati Spa for ultimate relaxation, and savour an array of gastronomic delights at seven unique dining venues, serving a range of international cuisines, including fine Thai delicacies.

hotels.title: Secluded Five-Star Phuket Escape with Three Beachfront Swimming Pools
hotels.description: Tranquillity takes on a new definition at SALA Phuket Resort and Spa. Nestled in the unspoilt northwest corner of Phuket, this five-star resort sits on the pristine shores of the island’s longest beach, where palm trees sway and white sand begs to be disturbed. Shuttle buses take you to the street-food markets of Phuket Old Town and lively bars of Patong should you wish to visit, but with 22sqkm of the coastal Sirinat National Park to explore, you can build your own Thai adventure. SALA Phuket is a masterclass in understated elegance and indulgence, with suites and villas that subtly whisper romance through open-air bathrooms and oversized beds you’ll want to sink into. Water-lovers will be spoilt for choice, with three beachfront pools and a collection of pool villas, all just a bucket-throw away from the glittering waters of the Andaman Sea. Spend your days snorkelling, boating or kayaking around the islands of Phang Nga Bay, before retiring to the award-winning spa for a revitalising treatment, or finding your zen with a yoga class on the beachfront. You’ll want to work up an appetite - the food is world-class, starting with pastries and eggs for breakfast, through to Thai favourites and Asian-Med delicacies for dinner. Soak it all in at the open-air SALA restaurant or opt for room service - it’s available until 10pm daily.

hotels.vendor_name: Hotel Pullman Phuket Arcadia Naithon Beach
hotels.title: Phuket Pullman Five-Star Cliffside Haven with Infinity Pool & Onsite Day Spa
hotels.description: Set your sights on paradise with a stay at this sprawling five-star Phuket retreat, set on a headland overlooking the turquoise Andaman Sea. This tropical haven emanates contemporary glamour and sophistication from all corners - laze by two infinity pools, discover bliss at the Dhatri Spa or head to any of the resort’s three ultra-stylish bars for expertly shaken cocktails. Whatever you choose, you’ll only ever be moments from the picture-perfect white sands of Naithon Beach.

hotels.title: Secluded Phuket Villa Escape near Patong with Onsite Dining, Day Spa & Beachfront Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Perched on the edge of the Andaman Sea, retreat to this architectural resort, superbly placed on a verdant hilltop between Kamala Bay and Patong Beach. Immerse yourself in tropical island bliss within design-led suites and villas, offering lush garden or sea views, and Phuket's longest beachfront infinity pool. Soak up panoramic ocean vistas while you sip on refreshing cocktails at The Meka Sky Lounge and dine on exquisite Thai delicacies at The Wiwa restaurant. With easy access to the powder-soft sands of Yae Beach, snorkel around in the local reef or venture out to explore the vibrant nightlife of Patong and Phuket Old Town, situated only 15 minutes away.

hotels.title: Five-Star Island Escape near Phuket with Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
hotels.description: Sparkling off the eastern shores of Phuket, Koh Maphrao is a beautifully secluded paradise crowned by the brand-new Island Escape by Burasari - an architecturally exquisite haven empowered by its natural surrounds, bringing a touch of supreme luxury to this unspoilt islet. Featuring an opulent collection of sleek rooms and private pool villas, and equally spectacular facilities, Island Escape by Burasari leaves you wanting for nothing. Swing above the adults-only lagoon in an overwater hammock, stroll over to the indulgent spa for some extra pampering or plunge into the fabulous swimming pool, complete with waterslide and floating sundecks. Kids can zipline and rock climb through an adventure-filled Treasure Island-inspired playground, while adults can share sunset cocktails at the beachfront restaurant or treetop bar. Claiming a pristine corner of the sugar-white coast, this boutique retreat is surrounded by a soul-stirring beauty that stretches from the glistening beach to the mountainous hinterland - offering a feeling of faraway barefoot bliss within easy distance of Phuket. **Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights):** - Wake up in island paradise with a delicious **daily beachfront breakfast** - Travel to the island with ease with **roundtrip boat transfers** - Celebrate your escape with a **daily hand-crafted cocktail** per adult - Indulge in a one-time **three-course dinner** (for stays of 3+ nights) - Unwind with a one-time **30-minute massage** per person (for stays of 5+ nights) - Treat yourself with **THB1,000 resort credit** per package (for stays of 7+ nights) **Travelling with family or friends?** Upgrade to a Two-Bedroom Villa (for up to four guests), a Three-Bedroom Villa (for up to six guests) or a Four-Bedroom Villa (for up to eight guests). **Looking for added luxury?** Upgrade to a Pool Villa and enjoy the added luxury of a private pool, or choose an Ocean-View Pool Villa (two, three or four-bedroom) and gaze out on sweeping sea vistas from your spacious sundeck.

hotels.vendor_name: Cape Sienna Phuket Gourmet Hotel & Villas
hotels.title: Stylish Oceanfront Phuket Retreat
hotels.description: Escape to Phuket’s high-end Millionaire’s Mile and indulge in a postcard-perfect break at Cape Sienna Phuket Gourmet Hotel & Villas, a cosmopolitan resort perched on the clifftops overlooking serene Kamala Bay. With picturesque uninterrupted sea views from almost every corner, this tranquil haven dials up the romance, offering pure indulgence with a side of beachside bliss. Every room or suite has a front-row seat to the Andaman Sea, but it’s at the restaurants and bars that the serene setting comes into its own. Peel your eyes away from the floor-to-ceiling windows at the ultra-romantic Plum to focus on the charcoal oven, where prime cuts of beef and fresh seafood are expertly prepared, or venture to Vanilla Sky Bar for cocktails on the ocean-view terrace. Switch between lazing in the infinity pool and sipping on cocktails at the open-air Sienna Rocks Café, or slip into the resort's second pool, 30 metres long and lined with palm-fringed cabanas and a poolside restaurant. Restore mind and body with a traditional Thai massage or deep-cleansing facial at Balance Spa or, if you’ve got extra energy to burn, rally on the rooftop tennis court and get your blood pumping in the stylish gym.

hotels.title: Phuket Escape near Patong Beach & Bang La Road with Three-Tier Pool
hotels.description: Discover blissful serenity at this Phuket resort moments from the beach, offering an unbeatable position in vibrant Patong. With unrivalled ocean views, first-class facilities - including a spectacular three-tiered pool - and easy access to Patong Beach and the legendary entertainment district Bang La Road, you’ll be all set to savour time spent in paradise. Take your stay to the next level with a visit to Le Spa, offering traditional massages and holistic therapies designed to rejuvenate and revitalise.

hotels.title: Secluded Phuket Hillside Indulgence with Onsite Dining, Pools & Spa
hotels.description: A secluded sanctuary nestled high above the island’s coastline, The Pavilions Phuket is the ideal hideaway for those seeking total privacy and intimacy. Perched dramatically on a lush hillside, this five-star retreat offers breathtaking views over the sparkling Andaman Sea and verdant mountains of Phuket’s tranquil northwest coast - far from the crowds and never too close to the beach bustle. Ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, this romantic escape is the tropical paradise you’ve been dreaming of. Dine at Firefly Pool & Restaurant, a laidback yet stylish dining experience where you'll take a front-row seat by the open kitchen as your traditional Thai feast is brought to life. Unwind in one of two serene swimming pools, salute the sun on the yoga deck or indulge in next-level relaxation at The Pavilions Spa - all set within an elevated retreat designed for peace, seclusion and pure indulgence.

hotels.title: Multi-Award-Winning Five-Star Phuket Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Rooftop Cocktails
hotels.description: Experience Phuket like never before from the glamorous, five-star Nai Harn, ranked #1 resort in Nai Harn on Tripadvisor, #2 in Thailand at the Condé Nast Traveler Readers’ Choice Awards, and the only Leading Hotels of the World member on the entire island. Offering unbeatable views over the island’s best beach - a peaceful stretch of pristine sands away from the hustle and bustle - together with outstanding facilities and five-star service, this ultra-luxe oasis is an oceanfront sanctuary surrounded by lush rainforest and crystal-clear waters. Pamper yourself at the spa, drink and dine across five onsite bars and restaurants, and make the most of unique luxury touches such as beach butler service and private terrace barbecues.

hotels.title: Five-Star Phuket Movenpick Escape Steps from Bangtao Beach with Four Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Indulge in beachfront luxury at this Mövenpick jewel in Phuket, offering easy access to the pristine sands of Bangtao Beach. Blending the best of classic Thai and contemporary design, this family-friendly retreat is home to rooms, residences and penthouses that deliver contemporary luxury at its best. Five-star facilities more than match the accommodation - savour authentic Thai cuisine at The Palm Cuisine and Terrace, or satiate your sweet tooth at the daily Chocolate Hour, a hallmark of Movenpick resorts around the world. While the little ones are at the kids' club, soak away the day at Blossom Spa, relax in a cabana by the oceanfront pool or walk along the powder-white sands of Bangtao. Venture beyond the hotel to explore Cherng Talay, a local village with upmarket restaurants and historic temples.

hotels.title: Stylish Phuket Escape near Bangla Road With Rooftop Bar & Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Embrace tuk tuks and tikis in tropical paradise with a stay at Hotel Indigo Phuket Patong, an IHG Hotel, located just a short walk from Bangla Road’s famously electrifying nightlife. Enjoy locally-sourced plates grilled to perfection at Butcher’s Garden restaurant, soul-stirring views high above Patong at the hotel’s rooftop bar and mirage-like infinity pool, thrilling muay thai bouts at the onsite ring or tropical sips at Pots, Pints & Tikis, serving up craft beers and handmade cocktails.

hotels.title: Five-Star Phuket Hideaway with Luxury Villas Near Bang Tao Beach
hotels.description: For an escape from reality, stay at the luxurious Banyan Tree Phuket nestled on the fringes of Bang Tao Beach and ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. This private paradise is the perfect spot to unwind: tee off on the 18-hole golf course, take a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool, and be lulled into total relaxation at Banyan Tree Spa with a traditional spa treatment using local remedies. For gourmands, there's no shortage of mouthwatering food options onsite with four dining venues offering everything from authentic Thai cuisine and fresh seafood to plant-based specialties. Banyan Tree Phuket sits on 89 acres including tennis courts, cycling paths, and lakes and canals perfect for watersports. Meanwhile, the golden shores of Bang Tao Beach, one of the most picturesque beaches on the island, are around a 10-minute walk away. When you’re feeling adventurous, venture further into the centre of town, where bustling night markets, shops, restaurants and bars are a 30-minute drive away.

hotels.title: Luxury Phuket Resort Minutes from Surin Beach
hotels.description: Discover your own tropical oasis at The Chava Resort, a luxurious retreat ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, less than a five-minute stroll from the golden sandy shores of Surin Beach. Spend your days lounging on the beach, take part in a cooking class, peruse the local markets, or take a trip out to Phang Nga Bay to see the incredible limestone karsts that jut from the emerald waters. Back at the resort, step inside the grand palatial lobby and admire the modern luxury with flourishes of traditional Thai design which flows through the entire resort. Take a dip in the glorious swimming pool, dine alfresco at the restaurant nestled in the tropical gardens, and indulge in a rejuvenating Thai massage from the privacy of your room.

hotels.vendor_name: Pullman Phuket Arcadia Karon Beach Resort
hotels.title: Phuket Beachside Paradise with Eight Dining Venues, Five Pools & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Enjoy the charms of Phuket with a luxurious stay at this tropical oasis, located just a stone's throw from the shimmering Andaman Sea and the lively Karon Beach. After days spent exploring the bustling Karon Market or dining at any of eight onsite eateries, from casual bites and beers to fine set-menu dining, retreat to the resort's tranquil spa or take a dip in one of five lagoon-style pools. The hotel also offers a dedicated kids' club, making it an ideal choice for families.

hotels.title: Mövenpick Phuket Island Indulgence near Patong Beach with Onsite Spa & Kids' Club
hotels.description: If you’re dreaming of a tropical paradise, this is the place for you - offering relaxation for those who want to unwind and gourmet delights for food enthusiasts. Fill your days lounging beside the palm-fringed swimming pool, rejuvenating body and soul in the fitness centre or pampering yourself with an out-of-this-world treatment at A VIDA Spa. The peace within the resort's enclave makes you feel tucked away, but you're only a short walk from bustling Bangla Road and the popular shores of Patong Beach. This indulgent oasis is renowned for its gourmet dining, don't miss the creative cocktails at Azure Pool Bar or the Thai, Sino-Portuguese and Western dishes served at Atrio Restaurant in a striking setting.

hotels.vendor_name: Novotel Phuket Kata Avista Resort and Spa
hotels.title: Phuket Novotel Tropical Escape near Kata Beach with Three Pools & Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Experience the sun-drenched allure of Phuket from this sprawling Novotel sanctuary, perched atop a hillside and overlooking the aquamarine waters of the Andaman Sea, moments from Kata Beach's sands. Perfect for family-friendly times, splash around in the two-tier pools, and sip on drinks at the Zing Swim-Up Pool Bar while your kids stay engaged with a wide range of activities, including a Splashpad and the Little Ocean Kids' Club. When hunger strikes, dine under the open sky at the elegant En Vogue, relishing gastronomical delights or indulge in a traditional Thai massage at the InBalance Spa. Beyond the resort, you'll be within easy reach of Phuket's countless riches, including Karon Beach's famous stretch and the island's most iconic sights, like the mighty Big Buddha and Patong are a short tuk-tuk ride away.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Phuket Escape with Three Lagoon Pools, Thai Designs & Luxury Spa
hotels.description: Escape to this pristine hideaway just steps from Patong's beautiful beach and the busy night markets of Phuket. Dive into the hotel's three lagoon-style pools, relish authentic Thai cuisine at Bubbles Restaurant, or indulge in traditional treatments at Ryn Spa. Learn a new skill with Thai cooking classes with master chefs (extra charges apply) or burn some calories at the state-of-the-art fitness centre. Venture out to the nearby Jungceylon Shopping Centre for a shop-till-you-drop experience, or take a short drive to the stunning viewpoints at Karon Beach and be mesmerised by the beauty of this beach lovers' destination. Indulge in Thai hospitality and luxury at its best at this beautiful residence in a tropical paradise.

hotels.title: Ultra-Stylish Beachside Phuket Hideaway with Three Pools & Acclaimed Fine Dining
hotels.description: Experience the perfect blend of contemporary design and natural splendour at this incredibly stylish sanctuary, just steps from the shimmering sands of Nai Yang Beach. As you wander the tropical garden paths you’ll notice the nod to the island's tin-mining history with charming sculptures throughout. Black Ginger is a place where traditional dishes and modern dining combine, while the retro-inspired Tongkah Tin Syndicate offers refreshing cocktails following an afternoon swim.

hotels.vendor_name: V Villas Phuket MGallery by Sofitel
hotels.title: Boutique Phuket Private Pool Villas with Onsite Spa & Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Treat yourself to a five-star boutique oasis nestled in a secluded location on the southeastern tip of Phuket. Overlooking picturesque Ao Yon Bay and the sparkling Andaman Sea, this tropical haven is home to the acclaimed Akoya | Star Lounge, a rooftop bar with 360 degree views of the island. Venture out to explore the vibrant local markets, or savour authentic Thai cuisine at the hotel's exquisite onsite restaurant Yon | Ocean House. When you're not exploring the island's pristine beaches and lush landscapes, indulge in a soothing treatment at the world-class spa.

hotels.vendor_name: Dinso Resort & Villas Phuket, an IHG Hotel
hotels.title: Phuket Japanese-Inspired Five-Star Tropical Oasis near Patong Beach
hotels.description: Barefoot luxury meets five-star opulence at Dinso Resort & Villas Phuket, an IHG Hotel, a breathtaking oasis nestled amid the tropical greenery of Thailand, just moments from Patong Beach's golden sands and the aquamarine ocean. Inspired by Japanese wabi-sabi philosophy, this pristine sanctuary boasts an inimitable rustic charm - sip on refreshing cocktails at Sanya Coffee Bar & Wine before treating your taste buds to native Thai flavours at The Rice Restaurant.

hotels.title: Multi-Award-Winning Phuket Wellness Retreat with Blissful Ayurah Spa
hotels.description: Let waves of relaxation wash over you at the five-star, multi-award-winning Aleenta Phuket-Phang Nga Resort & Spa, less than a 30-minute drive from Phuket Airport. Indulge with treatments from an extensive menu at the award-winning Ayurah Spa, from the Harmonizing Body & Mind Massage to traditional Thai healing treatments, rejuvenating facials, manicures and pedicures. Sit back, relax and embrace Thai living at its most idyllic along the secluded shores of Natai Beach. Framed by the natural splendour of the nearby Phang Nga limestone karsts and resting on 10 kilometres of peaceful golden sands, where jet skis, sun umbrellas and hawkers are banned, only the lapping of the sea will disturb the serene silence of your stay at this Leading Hotel of the World. The onsite wellness center, part of the Ayurah Wellness retreats, is a sanctuary of calm with rejuvenating treatments, a relaxation chamber, and a Vichy shower room for soothing water massages. Guests can enjoy complimentary wellness classes along with personalised exercise programs led by trainers.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Phuket Pool Villas with Top-Rated Wellness Spa
hotels.description: Draped in Phuket's lush rainforest and overlooking the Andaman Sea, Keemala is an architectural wonder expertly crafted for honeymooners, romantics and those seeking a truly unique stay. Take your Thailand escape to new levels with private pools and verdant views from every villa, an immersive and sustainable approach to fine dining at Mala Restaurant, Mala Bar and Cha-La Pool Bar, and total tranquility on offer at Mala Spa, where the best of modern pampering regimes heal the body and invigorate the mind.

hotels.title: Secluded Five-Star Phuket Wellness Retreat Overlooking the Andaman Sea
hotels.description: Swathe yourself in unparalleled relaxation and sweeping Andaman vistas at Amatara Welleisure™ Resort, a five-star retreat gracing the turquoise shores of Phuket's Cape Panwa. Promising a complete mind and body metamorphosis through an exceptional program of wellness activities and workshops, this secluded oasis is imbued with a tranquil ambience designed to leave you feeling inspired by the benefits of healthy living. Whether you want to align your chakras or your posture, increase your heart rate or slow it right down, Amatara Welleisure™ Resort has thought of everything - from its state-of-the-art pilates studio to its holistic in-house physiotherapists. Let off some steam in the Thai hammam, cleanse away the cocktails with a pampering spa treatment or make friends in a group fitness class. Take up a new hobby or fine-tune existing skills with expert instructors on hand to teach anything from Muay Thai to traditional yoga, or boost your energy with a friendly volleyball match on the resort's stretch of private beach. When it's time to wind down, indulge in fresh and hearty cuisine across the resort's three impressive restaurants, catch some rays on the romantic roof terrace or cool off in the gorgeous lagoon pool overlooking the bay.

hotels.title: Fun-Filled Phuket Escape on Bang Tao Beach
hotels.description: Experience the ultimate fun-filled escape at Angsana Laguna Phuket, perfectly set on the shores of Bang Tao Beach, surrounded by a glittering lagoon with an endless supply of exciting activities on offer. Dive into the 300-metre swimming pool, go paddleboarding across the lagoon and order cocktails for your cabana at the ritzy swim-up bar and lounge at XANA Beach Club. Drop the little ones off at Angsana Kids’ Club for a day filled with treasure hunts, face painting and cooking classes, while you treat yourself to a traditional Thai massage at the luxe Angsana Spa. The resort is part of a wider complex, where you can tee off at an award-winning 18-hole golf course, dine in an abundance of restaurants and explore stunningly manicured landscapes. Daily shuttle services operate every 30 minutes from the resort and zip across the complex, making exploration easy. A few kilometres away, you can indulge in shopping at the open-air malls, Porto de Phuket or Boat Avenue, which has a weekly night market.

hotels.title: Tropical Phuket Escape near Patong Beach with Pool Bar & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: It's time to indulge in the tropical allure of Phuket with a stay at at this expansive resort, perfectly positioned in the vibrant Patong district. From authentic Thai cuisine at the hotel's Square Restaurant to refreshing drinks at the Velvet Pool Bar, your culinary experiences are carefully curated under one roof. For a stress-free escape, enjoy rejuvenating treatments and massages at the In Balance Spa and for the little ones, there's a dedicated kids' club to keep them entertained. This family-friendly retreat also offers easy access to the glittering Andaman Sea and the bustling Bangla Road, renowned for its vibrant nightlife. It is just steps away from the dreamy Patong Beach, making it the ideal choice for beach babies. Among other popular spots nearby are the Jungceylon shopping mall, the Simon Cabaret and Phuket Fantasea.

hotels.title: Pullman Phuket Beachfront Escape with Infinity Pool, Onsite Spa & Four Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Treat yourself to a five-star tropical oasis nestled in a secluded location on the southeastern tip of Phuket. Overlooking picturesque Makham Bay and the sparkling Andaman Sea, this tropical haven is the perfect haven for a flop-and-drop vacation. Spend your days tasting the flavours of Thailand at Tamarind restaurant, sipping coffee at The Junction lounge, or devouring cocktails and club sandwiches at the poolside Edge Beach Club. Should you be in search of a little action, take advantage of the watersports and marine activities on offer, or explore Phuket's technicolour Old Town - just a short 20-minute drive away.

hotels.title: Blissful Five-Star Cliffside Resort with Picturesque Bay Views
hotels.description: Discover the glistening turquoise waters of Phang Nga Bay with a stay at the ultra-lux COMO Point Yamu - an oasis perched atop the limestone cliffs. This resort offers a peaceful island paradise on the east coast of Phuket, where you can explore the old town, hike to the best vantage points and learn how to cook in authentic Thai style. Luxuriate in the spa and wellness centre, sip on a cocktail by the pool as you watch the sun set over the bay and enjoy exquisite dining at the two onsite restaurants.

hotels.title: MGallery Opulence near World-Best Beach with Award-Winning Spa, Three Pools & Scenic Dining
hotels.description: A boutique hilltop retreat, this award-winning romantic sanctuary is an idyllic haven for travellers who want the best of both worlds. Enjoy breathtaking Andaman Sea views and close proximity to Freedom Beach, ranked among the world’s best beaches. Sink into total bliss at the award-winning spa, sip your favourite cocktails beside any of the three sparkling pools and taste your way through the hotel’s three restaurants, including dazzling Indian dishes at Tambu Phuket, which claims one of the best sunset viewpoints on the whole island.

hotels.title: Five-Star Phuket Pool Villas with Private Beach & Five Onsite Restaurants
hotels.description: Hidden among lush jungles and secluded sands, the five-star Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas stands as the ultimate romantic escape. This serene oasis boasts 83 pool villas, each clustered around a lotus-filled central lagoon, effortlessly combining cutting-edge luxury with Southern Thai style. You’ll fall in love with the resort’s dazzling array of first-class facilities - relish treehouse omakase on top of an ancient banyan tree, revitalise with ayurvedic wellness treatments at Anantara Spa or savour cocktails as you watch the sun fall spectacularly beneath the shimmering Andaman Sea. Whatever you decide, you'll be surrounded by the resort's soul-stirring beauty and top-notch service.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Phuket Private Pool Villa Retreat
hotels.description: Experience pristine beachfront luxury at the award-winning, five-star The Shore at Katathani - a private pool sanctuary hidden in the Phuket cliffside, with stunning vistas over Kata Noi Beach. Spend sun-kissed days on your private terrace or stroll hand-in-hand along The Ocean Walk and sink your toes into white sands. Indulge in a couples' massage at the luxurious Serenity Spa, or share in a special moment watching the sun shimmer across the Andaman at The Nest Beach Club.

hotels.title: Phuket Beachfront Indulgence with Nine Pools & 15 Onsite Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: With unrivalled views of the sparkling Andaman Sea, this is undoubtedly one of Phuket’s finest resorts. This beachfront retreat is all about luxury with nine incredible swimming pools and an indulgent haven of relaxation in Tew Son Spa. Perched on 850 metres of white sand on secluded Kata Noi Beach, Katathani Phuket Beach Resort offers a luxurious escape amid acres of sprawling gardens. Sister property of The Shore at Katathani, this stunning resort is just a 30-minute tuk-tuk ride from Patong’s world-class shopping and dining. The resort features a long list of glamorous facilities, including three hot tubs and two bubbly water springs. For the little ones, there are three child-friendly pools, a mini waterslide, outdoor playground and Chang Noi Kids’ Club. Expect nothing but the finest food and thirst-quenching drinks beneath the Thai sunshine, with multiple onsite restaurants and bars, many exclusive to hotel guests. Be spoiled for choice with authentic Italian cuisine, open-air Thai dining, fresh grilled seafood and beloved international dishes.

hotels.vendor_name: Avista Grande Phuket Karon, MGallery by Sofitel
hotels.title: Relaxing Phuket Resort Near Karon Beach with Swim-Up Bar & Onsite Day Spa
hotels.description: Experience the enchanting allure of Thailand at this expansive resort which woos you with its old-world charm and modern-day luxuries. This five-star sanctuary is a stone's throw from the golden sands of Karon Beach and the vibrant local markets. Treat your palate to authentic Sino-Portuguese and Thai flavours at Portosino or indulge in a cocktail at the rooftop bar, Dim Sun, offering panoramic sea views. A sparkling pool with a cascading waterfall invites you for the most refreshing swim and a spa, awarded for its exclusive and traditional Thai massages will leave you stress-free to enjoy the best of Phuket.

hotels.vendor_name: Holiday Inn Resort Phuket Surin Beach, An Ihg Hotel
hotels.title: Phuket Family-Friendly Seaside Paradise with Two Pools & Three Dining Venues
hotels.description: Spoil your crew with a trip to one of Phuket's best family resorts. This expansive complex is just a moment's walk from the powder-fine shores of Surin Beach and offers everything a young family could wish for within its grounds. Here, your little adventurers can dive into their own fun-filled world - whether it's zipping down the waterslides, battling it out in the arcade, kicking back with a movie in the kids' club or swimming across two sparkling pools. Plus, three eateries are on hand for delicious Thai dishes, international favourites and even an onsite ice-cream shop to cool off after days on the sand.

hotels.title: Luxury Phuket Island Paradise overlooking Andaman Sea with Five Restaurants
hotels.description: Powdery sands and rolling verdant hills collide with sophisticated beachside accommodation at the ultra-luxurious Anantara Layan Phuket Resort and Layan Residences by Anantara, along with an unmissable view of the majestic Andaman Sea. Take in the gilded surroundings with hints of traditional Thai design before diving into the expansive opportunities the resort has to offer. Cast a line into the ocean on your doorstep, master Muay Thai with a professional trainer, or taste vintage wines paired with stunning cuisine and knowledge from the resort’s own wine gurus (own expense). Phuket itself is filled with vibrant adventures waiting for you, from bustling markets to mind-blowing street food and historic temples. After your rejuvenating vacation, glide off into the clouds with the island's only luxury helicopter charter - a wondrous experience from start to finish (own expense).

hotels.title: Tropical Phuket Paradise on the Marina with Pool Bar, Cafe & Restaurant
hotels.description: Soak up the utterly relaxed atmosphere, lush tropical gardens and convenient location on the marina with a comfortable stay at NH Boat Lagoon Phuket Resort. Sip cocktails by the impressive resort-style pool, treat yourself to midday pick-me-ups at Lighthouse Cafe, and indulge in casual all-day dining at Harbour restaurant. Wander along the nearby marina boardwalk and check out the area’s vibrant dining and shopping scene, and happily return to a luxurious and welcoming base.
